response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds significant value for you. After careful consideration and evaluation, I am extending an offer to purchase this item from me at a special price of $900,000. This exceptional offer is tailored to reflect the substantial worth you perceive in the product, while also ensuring a fair return for my investment. I believe this price point presents an excellent chance for both of us to achieve our financial goals. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you have any questions about the product. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 900000}
